amendment.description: Amendment sought to limit funds in the bill from being used by the Export-Import Bank of the United States to approve an application for a long-term loan or loan guarantee with respect to an oil and gas field development project.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to provide for a limitation on the use of Export/Import Bank funds to approve an application for a long-term loan or loan guarantee with respect to an oil and gas field development project.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sanders amendment (A021) Failed by recorded vote: 178 - 228 (Roll no. 247).
